abstract: The energy giant said that it expected to cope reasonably well with the volatility in oil prices as it reported a third consecutive quarter of earnings that beat analysts’ estimates.
snippet: The energy giant said that it expected to cope reasonably well with the volatility in oil prices as it reported a third consecutive quarter of earnings that beat analysts’ estimates.
lead_paragraph: LONDON  The energy giant BP said Tuesday that it expected to cope reasonably well with the volatility in oil prices as it reported a third consecutive quarter of earnings that beat analysts’ estimates.

headline.main: BP Posted 83% Profit Rise in 3rd Quarter
headline.print_headline: BP Projects Confidence After Posting an 83% Rise in Profit
